posts.title: Axios in React
posts.body: Axios, which is a popular library is mainly used to send asynchronous HTTP requests to REST endpoints. This library is very useful to perform CRUD operations.

posts.title: Adv Java
posts.body: Advanced Java is the collection of technologies and tools that enable developers to create dynamic and secure applications, including features such as JDBC (Java Database Connectivity), Servlets , and JSP (JavaServer Page) are being used for generating and making interactive dynamic content, the most important feature of advanced Java is JPA (Java Persistence API), that is used for managing relational databases, Spring Framework that encompasses the modules for dependency injection, Spring MVC Framework, and AOP (Aspect-Oriented Programming), and Spring Security that ensures the authentication, and authorization of the application.

posts.title: Full Stack Using Web Development
posts.body: Full Stack web developers have the ability to design complete web applications and websites. They work on the frontend, backend, database, and debugging of web applications or websites.
